content.rendered: M. S. Rao describes the challenges that corporate leaders face today and uses case studies with inspiring examples of successful CEOs including Jack Welch, Alan Mulally, Warren Buffett, Bill Gates, Richard Branson, Steve Jobs, Jeff Bezos, Herb Kelleher, Lakshmi Niwas Mittal, Carly Fiorina and political leaders including, Abraham Lincoln and Lee Kuan Yew to accompany his expert analysis. His success sutras will raise the quality of leadership and improve motivational power for any leaders who implement them.
